Description: On US-58 in the City of Suffolk, in the vicinity of Chappell Dr; City Rt. 647E/W (City of Suffolk), near 4600 Holland Road, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. All west lanes are alternating closures.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 286.6 in the City of Virginia Beach, near Providence Road, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage
